question: Only about one percent of plants have lost what ability, turning them into consumers and even predators, instead of producers?

nodes.text: Flowering is an ability lost by only about one percent of plants, turning them into consumers and even predators instead of producers.
Rooting is an ability lost by about one percent of plants, turning them into consumers and even predators instead of producers.
Growth is the ability lost by approximately one percent of plants, transforming them into consumers and even predators instead of producers.
Photosynthesis is the ability lost by about one percent of plants, turning them into consumers and even predators instead of producers.
